main_definition: A large, powerful wild cat native to the Americas or an expensive luxury car made by British automaker Jaguar.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A species of big cats in the Panthera genus known for its strength and stealth
meanings_and_examples.example: The jaguar is an apex predator, capable of taking down animals much larger than itself.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opulent luxury vehicle produced by British car company Jaguar
meanings_and_examples.example: She couldn't resist buying the sleek black jaguar despite its hefty price tag.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical term used to describe someone who is exceptionally quick and powerful in their actions or abilities
meanings_and_examples.example: His moves on the football field were so swift, they likened him to a jaguar when dribbling past defenders.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of measurement equivalent to 10/32 of an inch or approximately 8.07mm
meanings_and_examples.example: The length of the object was measured using inches and was found to be precisely one jaguar long.
